alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:20PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwest Denver and western Adams Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over northern Denver and southwestern Commerce City, or 6 miles north of Denver, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Denver, Thornton, eastern Westminster, eastern Broomfield, Commerce City, Northglenn, Brighton, southeastern Wheat Ridge, Federal Heights and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
